response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and value, we believe it's worth more than what many might pay for similar offerings in the market. Considering its true worth to you, we're extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product for a special introductory price of $12,000. This offer not only ensures you secure a high-quality item but also saves you a significant amount compared to its market value of $15,000. We're confident this investment will yield substantial benefits for you. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information to make your decision.", "product_price": 12000}
